description: Fetch and manage Sentry issue and event details seamlessly. Integrate with your Sentry projects to retrieve insights and streamline your debugging process. Enhance your workflow by leveraging Sentry's powerful API through a standardized interface.

sentryBaseUrl.description: Optional: The Sentry base URL. Defaults to https://sentry.io

sentryOrgSlug.description: The slug of your Sentry organization

capabilities.name: get_sentry_issue
capabilities.description: Get details for a specific Sentry issue using its ID or URL

capabilities.name: list_organization_projects
capabilities.description: List all projects for the configured Sentry organization

capabilities.name: list_project_issues
capabilities.description: List issues for a specific project, with optional filtering.

capabilities.name: get_event_details
capabilities.description: Get details for a specific event within a project.
